cgcloud__Payment_Tactic_Product__c.name: cgcloud__Payment_Tactic_Product__c
cgcloud__Payment_Tactic_Product__c.description: This object contains payment tactic products and assigned values at the LDP level or at the level that the project defines as payment product level.

LastActivityDate.description: Most recent date on which a user last performed an action on the record.

cgcloud__Additional_Kpi_Value_1__c.description: KPI value for the measure that's defined in Payment_Template__c.Additional_Snapshot_Kpi_Definition_1__c.

cgcloud__Additional_Kpi_Value_2__c.description: KPI value for the measure that's defined in Payment_Template__c.Additional_Snapshot_Kpi_Definition_2__c.

cgcloud__Additional_Kpi_Value_3__c.description: KPI value for the measure that's defined in Payment_Template__c.Additional_Snapshot_Kpi_Definition_3__c.

cgcloud__Amount__c.description: Payment amount for the current tactic or product combination.

cgcloud__Payment_Tactic__c.description: Payment/Tactic combination to which the record belongs.

cgcloud__Product__c.description: Product to which the record belongs. The level of the product is bound by Payment_Template__c.Snapshot_Product_Level__c.
